title: Ranked taken down?
body: I haven't seen  any posts in my searches, but Ranked is not an available option in the NA client. Any news on ranked being taken down for any particular reason.

replies.body: Are you looking for Ranked Solo Draft pick or Ranked Teams Draft pick? Teams is on a [schedule](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209964886-Ranked-Teams-Schedule) while Solo should be available at all times.
